docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index
show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: create

params.name: ip
params.description: not required if using a subnet with dhcp proxy

params.name: mac
params.description: not required if its a virtual machine

params.name: progress_report_id
params.description: UUID to track orchestration tasks status, GET /api/orchestration/:UUID/tasks

examples:
POST /api/hosts
{
  "host": {
    "name": "testhost11",
    "environment_id": "334344675",
    "domain_id": "22495316",
    "ip": "10.0.0.20",

    "operatingsystem_id": "1073012828",

    "compute_resource_id": "980190962"
  }
}

methods.name: status
methods.full_description:
Return value may either be one of the following:

  • missing
  • failed
  • pending
  • changed
  • unchanged
  • unreported

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.
